titleStmt.title: His Maiestyes Note deliuered vnto M. Fisher.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: His Maiestyes Note deliuered vnto M. Fisher.

monogr.title: The answere vnto the nine points of controuersy, proposed by our late soueraygne (of famous memory) vnto M. Fisher of the Society of Iesus : And the reioynder vnto the reply of D. Francis VVhite minister. With the picture of the sayd minister, or censure of his writings prefixed
monogr.author: Fisher, John

div.head: His Maiestyes Note deliuered vnto M. Fisher.
div.p: SOME of the principall points which with-hold my ioyning vnto the Church of Rome, except she reforme her selfe, or be able to giue me satisfaction, Are these.

list.item: 2. The Prayings & Offering oblations to the Blessed Virgin Mary.
4. The Liturgy, & priuate Prayers for the Ignorant in an vnknowne Tongue.
5. Repetitions of Pater Nosters, Aues, & Creeds, especially affixing a kind of merit to the number of them.
7. Communion vnder one kind, & the abetting of it by Concomitancy.
8. Workes of Supererogation, especially with reference vnto the Treasure of the Church.
9. The Opinion of deposing Kings, and giuing away their Kingdomes by Papall power, whether directly, or indirectly.
